div.p: Penn Hills Charter School of Entrepreneurship is Closed

Penn Hills Charter School of Entrepreneurship will remain closed for in person instruction for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. All school-related events and use of school facilities requests are canceled. Information regarding our Continuity of Education Plan and COVID-19 can be found by clicking HERE.

section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-44acaf0c elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section

div.div: Penn Hills Charter School Of Entrepreneurship

div.p: The Penn Hills Charter School of Entrepreneurship will provide a hands-on, engaging program designed to bring entrepreneurial and economic concepts alive for students. The lessons related to the Pennsylvania Core Curriculum of English Language Arts, Mathematics, Science, and Social Studies will incorporate the basic economic and entrepreneurial concepts.

section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-240392b elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section

div.p: We are a 4-STAR MicroSociety school. We incorporate real-world experiences into basic curriculum which helps students apply what they learn in the classroom to real life.
An entrepreneurial education is geared towards equipping the next generation to improve their lives immediately and ultimately impact the world.
We equip parents with the tools to be an integral part of education. Our Parent Teacher Association (PTA) is dedicated to making our school exciting and dynamic.

section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-ee0fef3 elementor-hidden-desktop elementor-hidden-tablet elementor-hidden-phone elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section

div.div: Enroll Your Child Into Penn Hills Charter School of Entrepreneurship

div.p: By enrolling your child in our school, you make the decision to become part of a community dedicated to cultivating innovative, productive and responsible citizens.

At the Penn Hills Charter School Of Entrepreneurship, everyone is a decision-maker. That means all students are given the opportunity to develop and use their talents to make decisions and be held responsible for their learning gains.
